content: **marigold keychain crochet pattern perfect for beginners ** create your very own cheerful marigold keychain with this beginner-friendly crochet pattern this stash-busting project is ideal for using leftover yarn and produces vibrant flowers that can double as keychains bag charms or thoughtful handmade gifts the pattern includes step-by-step written instructions helpful tips and a video tutorial to guide you through every detail **pattern details ** * skill level beginner * materials worsted-weight acrylic yarn scraps are perfect * hook size 5mm or 6mm crochet hook * instructions for both right-handed and left-handed crocheters are available * includes tips for customization with colors beads and clips this quick and satisfying project is perfect for crochet lovers of all skill levels whether you re new to crochet or looking for a simple way to create personalized gifts this marigold keychain pattern is the perfect choice download the pattern today and bring a little handmade sunshine into your world note you re welcome to sell finished items made from this pattern but please credit secret yarnery as the designer ✅ free pattern https //bit ly/4ikmxek ✅ printable pdf pattern https //bit ly/43gcigw ✅ right handed tutorial https //youtu be/6rmwel3m3lg ✅ left handed tutorial https //youtu be/vi59zigersq
